name: The Adventures of Samuel Goldsmith
description:
The Adventures of Samuel Goldsmith is a prototype game of the beginning of an Epic Quest to save the Kingdom! Game Info

Play as Samuel Goldsmith, knight of the realm, explore the town of Saint Malen, interact with the locals, and find the items you need to continue your quest.

Version Info

The current version is 1.0. This is the only version of the game. The assets are several years old and were used mostly as a testing ground before I developed this small game with them.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact - Space
  • Inventory - E
Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just extract the downloaded ZIP file and launch the executable within the extracted folder.

Credits

This game was made solely by myself.

Project Info

Most of the 16x16 pixel visual assets in this game were made for a first year module back in 2019. A couple years later I decided to use the assets while practicing new things in Unity such as inventory systems and character interaction and dialogue. As a result, this small game was made.

Enjoy Playing!
